channel.title: Need a +1 Gen Success item
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "Need a +1 Gen Success item" - Got any extra +1 Gen Success items you don't need?

item.title: Re: Need a +1 Gen Success item
item.content:encoded: I would settle for 2.9, clearly mine is the better offer.

item.title: Re: Need a +1 Gen Success item
item.content:encoded: Dude, the +success items are worth a lot more than one ninja dog. You have to offer at least threeâ€¦ -.-;;

item.title: Need a +1 Gen Success item
item.content:encoded: Hello! If you have some extra/leftover/please please give them to me +1 Gen Success items, I need them to unlock the Wasteland. A plug suit is one I know of, but there are probably more. Any will do. Send to ritroumori in the game. Remember no caps in ritorumori. Will give Ninja Dog in return.
